remarks: The parallelogram law for an inner product space.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isph.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
isph.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
isph.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
isph.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
phpar2 $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` ( A G B ) ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` ( A M B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) ) ) $.
